AlienRace.AlienBackstoryDef.title: Illuminate child
AlienRace.AlienBackstoryDef.baseDesc: [PAWN_nameDef] was born in one of the training facilities devoted to producing the intelligent Illuminate Elite. [PAWN_possessive] formative years were occupied with many of the usual mundane types of education, but augmented with courses on observation and management.

AlienRace.AlienBackstoryDef.title: Illuminate child
AlienRace.AlienBackstoryDef.baseDesc: [PAWN_nameDef] was born in one of the training facilities devoted to producing the intelligent Illuminate Elite. [PAWN_possessive] formative years were occupied with many of the usual mundane types of education, but augmented with courses on observation and management.

AlienRace.AlienBackstoryDef.title: Illuminate child
AlienRace.AlienBackstoryDef.baseDesc: [PAWN_nameDef] was born in one of the training facilities devoted to producing the intelligent Illuminate Elite. AlienRace.AlienBackstoryDef.title: Lost egg
AlienRace.AlienBackstoryDef.baseDesc: When [PAWN_nameDef] hatched, it wasn't in one of the communal hatcheries that were devoted to caring for Avali eggs. It was in a dark, back room of an abandoned home. Too young and scared to venture out into the community, [PAWN_pronoun] spent most of [PAWN_possessive] youth alone and caring for [PAWN_possessive] self.

AlienRace.AlienBackstoryDef.title: Lost egg

AlienRace.AlienBackstoryDef.title: Illuminate core child
AlienRace.AlienBackstoryDef.baseDesc: [PAWN_nameDef] was born on one of the core planets in the Illuminate. [PAWN_pronoun] grew up in one of the many arcologies, spending much of [PAWN_possessive] time in arboretums.

AlienRace.AlienBackstoryDef.title: Artist child
AlienRace.AlienBackstoryDef.baseDesc: [PAWN_nameDef] was always doodling, sculpting or singing, and [PAWN_possessive] talent quickly flowered into a great natural ability for art, winning many prizes for their works.

AlienRace.AlienBackstoryDef.title: Artist child
AlienRace.AlienBackstoryDef.baseDesc: [PAWN_nameDef] was always doodling, sculpting or singing, and [PAWN_possessive] talent quickly flowered into a great natural ability for art, winning many prizes for their works.

AlienRace.AlienBackstoryDef.title: Architect
AlienRace.AlienBackstoryDef.baseDesc: In the Avali Illuminate, those with a natural talent for building and architecture are put into a special school with training programs established to produce fine architects. [PAWN_nameDef] spent [PAWN_possessive] childhood learning about various building materials, architecture, and the societies that employed them.

AlienRace.AlienBackstoryDef.title: Architect

AlienRace.AlienBackstoryDef.title: Independent youth
AlienRace.AlienBackstoryDef.baseDesc: [PAWN_nameDef] spent his youth on one of the many independent worlds, learning early how to survive off the land.

AlienRace.AlienBackstoryDef.baseDesc: [PAWN_nameDef] spent his youth on one of the many independent worlds, learning early how to survive off the land.

AlienRace.AlienBackstoryDef.title: Mechanical apprentice
AlienRace.AlienBackstoryDef.baseDesc: [PAWN_nameDef] was a technical apprentice working on all manner of machines. [PAWN_possessive] skills had developed even at a young age.

AlienRace.AlienBackstoryDef.title: Mechanical apprentice

AlienRace.AlienBackstoryDef.title: Military cadet
AlienRace.AlienBackstoryDef.baseDesc: [PAWN_nameDef] was enrolled in the military at a young age. [PAWN_pronoun] learned how to defend themself and their pack from hostiles.

AlienRace.AlienBackstoryDef.title: Military cadet
AlienRace.AlienBackstoryDef.baseDesc: [PAWN_nameDef] was enrolled in the military at a young age. [PAWN_pronoun] learned how to defend themself and their pack from hostiles.

AlienRace.AlienBackstoryDef.title: Animal lover
AlienRace.AlienBackstoryDef.baseDesc: [PAWN_nameDef] didn't have any advanced drones where they grew up, so they made friends with any wild animal they could find. Even bringing several home to [PAWN_possessive] packs dismay.

AlienRace.AlienBackstoryDef.title: Animal lover
AlienRace.AlienBackstoryDef.baseDesc: [PAWN_nameDef] didn't have any advanced drones where they grew up, so they made friends with any wild animal they could find. Even bringing several home to [PAWN_possessive] packs dismay.

AlienRace.AlienBackstoryDef.title: Apprentice nurse
AlienRace.AlienBackstoryDef.baseDesc: [PAWN_nameDef] was enrolled in one of the hospitals run by the Illuminate. [PAWN_pronoun] was trained in the care of others and develop a good bedside manner.

AlienRace.AlienBackstoryDef.title: Apprentice nurse
AlienRace.AlienBackstoryDef.baseDesc: [PAWN_nameDef] was enrolled in one of the hospitals run by the Illuminate. [PAWN_pronoun] was trained in the care of others and develop a good bedside manner.

AlienRace.AlienBackstoryDef.title: Armorer
AlienRace.AlienBackstoryDef.baseDesc: [PAWN_nameDef] is interested in guns and firearms of all kinds. [PAWN_possessive] interest led [PAWN_objective] to the military, where he was in charge of the Armory - maintiaing all the weapons and various equipment alongside the Gunsmiths.

AlienRace.AlienBackstoryDef.title: Armorer

AlienRace.AlienBackstoryDef.title: Doctor
AlienRace.AlienBackstoryDef.baseDesc: [PAWN_nameDef] graduated top of [PAWN_possessive] class and was accepted into the Illuminate's best hospital.

AlienRace.AlienBackstoryDef.title: Doctor
AlienRace.AlienBackstoryDef.baseDesc: [PAWN_nameDef] graduated top of [PAWN_possessive] class and was accepted into the Illuminate's best hospital.

AlienRace.AlienBackstoryDef.title: Lost survivor
AlienRace.AlienBackstoryDef.baseDesc: [PAWN_nameDef] was shipwrecked once before, losing [PAWN_possessive] entire pack. After months of fending for themselves, they were finally rescued. [PAWN_pronoun] still caries the scars of that event to this day.

AlienRace.AlienBackstoryDef.title: Lost survivor
AlienRace.AlienBackstoryDef.baseDesc: [PAWN_nameDef] was shipwrecked once before, losing [PAWN_possessive] entire pack. After months of fending for themselves, they were finally rescued. [PAWN_pronoun] still caries the scars of that event to this day.

AlienRace.AlienBackstoryDef.title: Chef
AlienRace.AlienBackstoryDef.baseDesc: [PAWN_nameDef] is am amazing cook. [PAWN_pronoun] can turn handfull of ingredients into a delicious meal. But don't ask [PAWN_objective] to get [PAWN_possessive] hands dirty, cause [PAWN_pronoun] won't like it.

AlienRace.AlienBackstoryDef.title: Former felon
AlienRace.AlienBackstoryDef.baseDesc: [PAWN_nameDef] made some bad choices in their life, even spending time incarcerated. They dont talk much about their time on the inside, but they appear to have turned over a new leaf.

AlienRace.AlienBackstoryDef.title: Assassin
AlienRace.AlienBackstoryDef.baseDesc: [PAWN_nameDef] is a professional Illuminate assassin. [PAWN_pronoun] has been trained to fight as a second nature. This did prevent [PAWN_pronoun] from developing many other skills.

AlienRace.AlienBackstoryDef.title: Assassin
AlienRace.AlienBackstoryDef.baseDesc: [PAWN_nameDef] is a professional Illuminate assassin. [PAWN_pronoun] has been trained to fight as a second nature. This did prevent [PAWN_pronoun] from developing many other skills.

AlienRace.AlienBackstoryDef.title: Toymaker
AlienRace.AlienBackstoryDef.baseDesc: [PAWN_nameDef] found [PAWN_pronoun] had a natural talent for making delicate items such as small gears, and inscribing beautiful designs. [PAWN_pronoun] also loved to bring smiles to the faces of hatchlings. [PAWN_pronoun] then naturally became a fine toymaker.

AlienRace.AlienBackstoryDef.title: Miner
AlienRace.AlienBackstoryDef.baseDesc: [PAWN_nameDef] could find an ore vein just by tapping on the stone and listing to the response. [PAWN_pronoun] is one of the finest miners the Independent Worlds has ever seen. Just don't ask [PAWN_nameDef] to cool a meal, unless you like the taste of dirt.

AlienRace.AlienBackstoryDef.title: Scientist
AlienRace.AlienBackstoryDef.baseDesc: [PAWN_nameDef] has dedicated [PAWN_possessive] life to the search for knowledge. From Astrology to Zoology, [PAWN_pronoun] has seen it all.

AlienRace.AlienBackstoryDef.title: Starbound
AlienRace.AlienBackstoryDef.baseDesc: [PAWN_nameDef] is Starbound adventurer. [PAWN_pronoun] has visited many planets, and met many species. They are well versed in many different trades.
